p.d: From the changing rooms of the swimming pool where they train, Romy and Orson, two disabled swimmers, share their vision of the world, a vision tainted with humour and self-deprecation. Directed by: Vincent Burgevin, Franck Lebon, Fabrice Chanut (season 7, France, 2017) Cast: Adda Abdelli (Romy), Alexandre Philip (Orson), AnaIs Fabre (Caro), Luc Rodriguez (Ramirez), Olivier Pleindoux (William), Philippe Sivy (Rolland), Fabrice Chanut (Ludovic), Yanik Vabre (Olivier), Cyril Missonnier (Dimitri), Aude Gogny-Goubert, Audrey Gbaguidi, Théo Curin, Clémentine Célarié, Pascal Légitimus, Jib Pocthier, Philippe Croizon, Florent Manaudou, Michel Cymes, Julien Schmidt, Fatsah Bouyahmed, Elsa Lunghini... Genre: comedy
